parsed_email.subject: RE: RE: MV THALASSINI - CTM REQUEST at NEXT CONVENIENT PORT
parsed_email.body_text:
Message Number: 718170
From: ops@astraship.com
To: THALASSINI (thalassini@vessels.astraship.com)
Cc: accounts@astraship.com
Sent: Thursday, Jul 17, 2025 17:16 (UTC +03:00)
Subject: RE: RE: MV THALASSINI - CTM REQUEST at NEXT CONVENIENT PORT

 
Dear Capt. Andy,
 
Regrettably CTM is not possible in Brazil unless you are willing to place yourself in mortal danger, as the law requires the Captain to go to the bank and withdraw the money himself then carry it back to the vessel.
 
Our commitment to crew safety does not allow for such reckless arrangements.
 
Trust to your understanding.
 
Best Regards,
George Tolakis
Operations Dept.
Astra Shipmanagement Inc.
As agents only
 
 

_________________Original Message_________________
